interface.SavageBannerDescription: Raid as a Scav is different from the raid as your main PMC character. There is no way to know the place and time of the Scav spawn, as there is no way to guess his starting gear or health condition. Death in the raid won't affect the progress or equipment of your main character - but if you manage to survive as Scav, your loot will go to the main character's stash.

interface.Select BEAR Character: You are an operator of BEAR, Russian PMC comprised of ex-special forces officers from all over former Soviet countries. The Bears were fighting in the Contract Wars as a Russian government proxy to uncover the illegal activities of Terra Group Labs and bring an end to the continued armed conflict with its security subcontractor, the Western-founded PMC USEC.
interface.Select USEC Character: You are an operator of USEC, the offshore-established PMC employed by Terra Group Labs as a security subcontractor. Over the Contract Wars, the primary goal of USEC was to destroy the evidence of any potentially illicit activity of the employer and protect its property from being captured by BEAR, the PMC hired by Russian government to investigate the Terra Group operations.

interface.Offline raid description:
For the purpose of enhancing the testing capabilities, the Beta version of the game includes a special offline mode that allows players to enter the raid alone. 
 This mode can be used for exploration and testing of location, weapon adjustment, character testing and other activities if the game servers are busy or unavailable. 
 
 Over time, we intend to expand the range of activites available in the offline mode to include as many features as viable for testing goals.

interface.Welcome screen description:
Welcome to Escape from Tarkov! 
In this game, you will have to fight for your life and survive the perils of Tarkov, a Russian city in the Norvinsk region, on the brink of chaos, collapse and the twilight of civilization. Your character is a contract operator of a Private Military Company (PMC), caught into the maelstrom of events right after Contract Wars. The area is sealed off, your operational command is not responding, former mission objectives have lost their purpose. Everybody has personal goals now - adapt and survive, exfiltrate the blockade of take control of others' lives by attempting to save them. 
 
 
Every single game session, be prepared to die and lose everything you had with you. Keep in mind, that every drop in your internet connection or network hardware malfunction can lead to disconnection from the game with consecutive death of you character and loss of all the stuff you had with you or found in the session. 
 
Yes, you will die, and, most probably, very often, but remember  - this is still a game. Best of luck out there!

interface.BEAR Matchmaker: Get into a raid and, as your main character, ex-BEAR PMC operator, do everything necessary to escape from Tarkov alive.
interface.USEC Matchmaker: Get into a raid and, as your main character, USEC PMC operator, do everything necessary to escape from Tarkov alive.
interface.Savage matchmaker: Go into the raid as Scav, a local bandit with a random set of starting gear. It's your Tarkov and you make the rules!
interface.AllGearAndLootLost: All gear and loot (either found in this raid or brought by player) are lost.
interface.BuyingInsuranceAndContainersWillSaveLoot: Buying insurance and secure containers will save loot and gear in case of your death.

interface.Please try to avoid ending the raid this: Please try to avoid ending the raid this way, or you will receive “leave” penalty. Your character is left in the raid without your control. You have a time-limited ability to reconnect to the raid.
interface.PlantLocationDescription: The industrial estate and facilities of the chemical plant #16 were rented out illegally to the TerraGroup company. During the Contract Wars the premises of the plant became a scene for numerous firefights between USEC and BEAR that determined control over the industrial district of Tarkov. Later on, in the wake of chaos, the plant premises turned into a shelter for remaining civilians, Savages and all kind of straggling military and armed forces, including scattered rema0ins of USEC and BEAR.

interface.EnduranceDescription: Endurance influences the amount of stamina and the rate of its exhaustion when running and jumping, as well as holding and restoring breath.
interface.StrengthDescription: The increase in strength allows to jump higher, sprint faster, hit harder and throw farther and, on top of that, carry more weight.
interface.VitalityDescription: Vitality improves the chances of surviving a wound by decreasing the possibility of bleeding and instant death through critical damage of one body part.
interface.HealthDescription: Good health speeds up the recovery from the damage sustained in the raids, decreases the probablity of fractures and lowers the energy and hydration drain.
interface.StressResistanceDescription: Stress resistance improves the chances of withstanding the injury shock and mitigates the algesic hand shakes and tremors.
interface.MetabolismDescription: Healthy metabolism imporves and extends the effects of eating and drinking, and sustains the physical skills longer.
interface.ImmunityDescription: Affects the susceptibility to illnesses and the effectiveness of their treatment.
interface.PerceptionDescription: Increases the hearing distance, improves aiming concentration and makes detection of the loot easier.
interface.IntellectDescription: High intellect boost the speed of item examination and lockpicking and improves the quality of weapon repairs.
interface.AttentionDescription: Attention is useful while searching various containers for loot, and increases the chance of noticing something valuable.
interface.CharismaDescription: Charisma affects the prices offered by traders and the rate of gaining reputation with them.
interface.MemoryDescription: Trained memory preserves the skill at once attained level for longer, before it starts to fade.
interface.EnduranceBreathElite: Physical exertion does not cause apnea

interface.StressPainChance: Decreases chance of getting pain shock [(-{0:0%})]
interface.MetabolismRatioPlus: Enhances food and drink positive effects [(+{0:0%})]

interface.MetabolismPhysicsForget: Decreases rate of forgetting physical skills [(-{0:0%})]

interface.Tutorial_ConfirmationDialog_Description: The game is currently in early access and undergoing intensive development. To get a quicker grip on interface and controls, please consider taking this brief training course. You can turn it off at any moment. \n\n Do you wish to start the training?
interface.Tutorial_TabOverall_Description: This is your main character. Here, it shows your level, the number of raids and kills, your efficiency and other stats. \n\nInfo from all tabs is available both in the Character section of the main menu and by pressing Tab in the raid.
interface.Tutorial_TabHealth_Description: Health tab displays the state of your health by body parts, current indicators of hydration and energy, and other characteristics. You can also track the state of each body part separately. For example, if you received a bleeding wound to the leg, it will be reflected with the appropriate status icon. By dressing the wound, you’ll be able to stop bleeding and losing hit points. Thoroughly prepare for raids beforehand, making reserves of essential medicines. And don't forget about the painkillers!
interface.Tutorial_TabGear_Description: The Gear tab contains your character’s equipment interface. Each slot is allocated for a specific type of equipment. Everything you take with you into the raid can be removed from your body by other players in case of your death. You can indemnify your losses by using the Insurance. In this case, if the item you insured wasn’t looted off the location, you will get it back.
interface.Tutorial_TabGearQuickBar_Description: It’s best to put loaded mags, ammo and grenades into chest rig or pockets to enable quick reload with R button. In other words, it’s only magazines (or grenades) that are in the chest rig that count. \n\nAlso, unlike the backpack, items from chest rig and pockets are available for quick access in the raid through keys 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 0, if you assign them by moving into the appropriate slot.
interface.Tutorial_TabGearHandBag_Description: The pouch holds a protected container. Items from this container cannot be removed from your body after death. We recommend to store particularly valuable items there, such as money, rare medicines, keys, etc.
interface.Tutorial_TabGearStash_Description: Stash is storage place for trophies from the raids and purchased items. Its size is limited, so we advise to arrange items compactly. The stash size can be indirectly increased by using specialized item containers, which are available from traders. Also, in the future, you will be able to increase the size of the stash in the Hideout. Owners of the Edge of Darkness Edition already have the maximum stash size from the start. \n\nTo rotate the object, press the R key while dragging it.
interface.Tutorial_TabGearInspectBeltWeapon_Descri: Double clicking on any object will display info about it. Here you can see the weapon characteristics, its parts and mods, and a brief description. Some items may not be known in advance. In this case their icons are blacked out and name is replaced with question marks. Such items should be examined. The examining takes some time, but after that, the item can be used. The game allows customization of weapons, which can be accessed by clicking the gear icon or from the right-click menu.
interface.Tutorial_TabGearInspectBeltWeaponModify_:
The game features highly detailed and realistic weapon models and behavior, hence, any changes will affect the performance characteristics and ergonomics. 

In order to install another detail or device you just need to select it in the dropdown list in the respective slot. 

Please note that installing various modules also changes the dimensions of the weapon. Make sure you have enough inventory space to customize the weapon.
interface.Tutorial_TabGearAmmoControl_Description: Loading magazines To load the magazine, drag the ammo onto it, but check if they are compatible first. To remove the ammo from the magazine or to eject the magazine from the weapon, please select the respective entries in the shortcut menu. Magazine or ammo will be dropped to the first free slot of the stash -- or vest, if the weapon was equipped by you. Use Ctrl + click to quickly store items to the backpack/vest/pockets or to unload them into stash. The ability to search and loot quickly is extremely important in combat conditions.
interface.Tutorial_TabGearReadyForEscape_Descripti: To install the magazine, simply drag it over the weapon. In order to adapt more quickly, try different tactics and experiment more. Escape from Tarkov is a hardcore shooter and therefore its main core is you, your knowledge and experience, and how you use them in combat. We also suggest you to examine the Controls section in the game settings to remember the main combat commands. Are you ready to escape?
interface.Tutorial_TabTrade_Description: Here you can see the list of traders. All of them are based in Tarkov, just like you, and have their own interests. Every one of them has his or her own needs and specifics in the range of items for purchase or on sale. Traders have several levels of loyalty, every next level gives access to new products. Loyalty depends on your reputation with a trader, your level and the amount of money spent. Let’s move on to the example of Prapor.
interface.Tutorial_TabTradeBuy_Description: To purchase an item, select it from the shop, press the Fill items button at the bottom of the screen to pay for supplies, and then DEAL at the top of the screen to confirm the transaction. \n\nSome things cannot be bought for money, and you will need to obtain the necessary barter items first.
interface.Tutorial_TabTradeSell_Description: To sell an item, open the Sell tab, and then drag the items you want sold to the area in the middle of the screen. Then, click DEAL. \n\nDifferent traders can offer different price for the same goods. Some items can only be of interest to specific traders.
interface.Tutorial_TabTradeQuest_Description: The best way to increase the trader loyalty level is to run errands and carry out tasks. Be careful, however, some of them may ask you to do things that will hurt your reputation with others. \n\nLet's take the first quest.
interface.Tutorial_CharacterSelection_Description: As Scav you don’t risk your gear, but if you survive the raid, all gear and loot can be transferred to the main character’s stash. Moreover, other AI-controlled NPC will consider you as one of their own, as long as you don't kill or insult anyone of them. However, in this case, the main character will not receive experience or upgrade skills. \n\nPlaying as a local scum is limited by a cooldown time. It's a good way to get familiar with the game without risking valuable equipment.
interface.Tutorial_LocationSelection_Description: You can choose one of the available maps. Each of them has its own characteristics -- such as raid duration and number of players -- and features a certain part of Tarkov. If you linger and don’t extract until the end of the raid, your character will be considered missing in action. By choosing time of the day, you will be spawned in the respective lighting conditions. Also, please mind the current weather conditions. A number of maps are still in development and therefore not available yet.
interface.Tutorial_InfiltrationAreaSelection_Descr: Taking a raid area map with you will allow you to choose the point of entry and see the possible exit locations. To see currently available exits during the raid, hit the "O" key twice. Exits can be both permanent and temporary. Temporary exits get closed if somebody has already fulfilled specified conditions, for example, if someone has already used the car as a way out, the car leaves and cannot be activated again. If the character doesn’t have a map with him, the entry point will be chosen randomly.
interface.Tutorial_OfflineModeSelection_Descriptio: Check the Offline mode box to test and try anything without having to worry about your gear in case of death. All features will be available, including AI enemies, if you enable PvE. \n\nHowever, no other players, naturally.
interface.Tutorial_InsuranceSelection_Description: Here you can insure your items. \n\nIn case of your death, if these items were not picked up and carried out by another player, they will get back to you over insurance return.
interface.ItemReward/Description: You will receive this item as a reward
interface.AssortmentUnlockReward/Description: You will be able to purchase this item from {0} as a reward
interface.Inventory Errors/Conflicting Items: Cannot install both {0} and {1} at the same time
interface.Tutorial_Confirmation_Description: You can invite your friends to join the group, if they have chosen the same location and the time of day. To do this, right-click on the player's nickname and select Invite to group. The maximum number of players in group is limited to 5. \n\nWhen the team is assembled and ready, click Ready to start the raid.
interface.KeyCombination_CheckMagazine: Check remaining ammo in the magazine
interface.KeyCombination_CloseQuartersWeaponAttack: Quick hit with axe or knife
interface.KeyCombination_TacticalLampMode: Switch flashlight or laser device mode
interface.KeyCombination_ExtractionList: Check the list of available exits
interface.Tutorial_Savage_Description: As Scav you don’t risk your gear, but if you survive the raid, all gear and loot can be transferred to the main character’s stash. Moreover, other AI-controlled NPC will consider you as one of their own, as long as you don't kill or insult anyone of them. However, in this case, the main character will not receive experience or upgrade skills. \n\nPlaying as a local scum is limited by a cooldown time. It's a good way to get familiar with the game without risking valuable equipment.
interface.Tutorial_Pmc_Description: This is your main character. You choose his equipment yourself, and his skills get upgraded and saved with every raid. Other players and Scavs will recognize you as a former PMC operative, with respective consequences. \n\nIf you get killed, you risk losing the equipment, however, you can buy a new one or procure something in the raid. Remember, only combat makes you tougher.
interface.Tutorial_EndScreenCongrats_Description: Congratulations! \n Now you can venture to explore the Tarkov universe on your own, and try to get out of the city.
interface.Tutorial_CloseConfirmationDialog_Descrip: The tutorial can be restarted only by resetting the player profile. \n\n Are you sure you want to skip it?
interface.MagDrillsInstantCheck: Magazine checked instantly when moved to your inventory
interface.MagDrillsInventoryCheckAccuracy: Increases accuracy of magazine check using the context menu [(level {0}%)]
interface.MagDrillsInventoryCheckSpeed: Decreases speed of magazine check using the context menu [(-{0}%)]
interface.MagDrillsLoadProgression: Magazine loading performs faster with every loaded ammo
interface.MagDrillsDescription: Skill aimed at magazine handling - loading and unloading of ammo, checking for remaining cartridges.

mail.5a8fd75188a45036844e0ad7: Whoa there! I've got some of your things that you insured {date} at {time} and lost at the {location} location. Mind it, I can't keep them forever, 24 hours max!
mail.5a8fd75188a45036844e0ad8: I've got some loot that came in batch here. Have you lost anything {date} at {time} at the {location} location?
mail.5a8fd75188a45036844e0ad9: Have you heard of massive action {date} at {time} at the {location}? Or maybe you were there too? I've got plenty of interesting stuff from there. Take a look, maybe some of yours even? Or I'm putting it up for sale.
mail.5a8fd75188a45036844e0ada: So I reckon it's yours, as per {date} insurance at the {location} location?
mail.5a8fd75188a45036844e0adb: As I take, you fell into insured occurrence {date} at the {location} location? Lucky you, your gear came back.
mail.5a8fd75188a45036844e0adc: What's up, soldier? Was it you who squandered all the stuff at the {location} location at {time} {date}? Take it till I changed my mind.
mail.5a8fd75188a45036844e0add: You got insured {date} at {time} at the {location} location? Lost your gear, musketeer? Pfft, grab it, Rambo, your assets were brought in.
mail.5a8fd75188a45036844e0ade: Seems like the {date} raid on {location} went wrong, huh? I know it did, since your stuff is here. You taking it or what?
mail.5a8fd75188a45036844e0adf: Chin up, soldier! Your insurance worked, the one from {date} at {time} at the {location} location. Not everyone gets this lucky often!
mail.5a8fd75188a45036844e0ae0: Oi, nerf gunner! Yeah, you. Had a feeling it's one of those days when packing up for {date} raid at the {location} location? You were right to get insured then. Take it and sign along the dotted line.
mail.5a8fd75188a45036844e0ae1: Mercenary, have you insured your possessions before {date} raid at {time} at {location} location? Your return.
mail.5a8fd75188a45036844e0ae2: Young man, I'm not adept at all this hardware, but apparently these are your belongings, insured {date} at {time}? They were brought back from {location} location.
mail.5a8fd75188a45036844e0ae3: Good you're here. Some items were brought back according to your {date} insurance from the {location} location, and they are not exactly my specialty, so please take care to receive them.
mail.5a8fd75188a45036844e0ae4: Do you still care for your effects, insured {date} at {time}? Take it as soon as possible, then.
mail.5a8fd75188a45036844e0ae5: Glad to see you in one piece, since your gear, insured {date} was brought back from the {location} location. Care to receive?
mail.5a8fd75188a45036844e0ae6: Insurance {date} in {time} complete. See you next time.
mail.5a8fd75188a45036844e0ae7: Great! I'm closing this case which was {date} in {time}. I hope you've got everything you lost.
mail.5a8fd75188a45036844e0aea: Hey! I told you that I can't hold you stuff for long! It's gone now!
mail.5a8fd75188a45036844e0aeb: Young man, I'm not a warehouse keeper and I can't hold your returned items forever. I'm afraid that this items are gone.
mail.5a8fd75188a45036844e0aed: No, no, no. Storage time expired and you can't get anything from this insurance return. Sorry.
mail.5a8fd75188a45036844e0aee: Ok, my guys went to retrieve your stuff. Sit tight, sugar.
mail.5a8fd75188a45036844e0aef: My colleagues are working on your situation. You need to wait for some time.
mail.5a8fd75188a45036844e0af0: My guys went for your things
mail.5a8fd75188a45036844e0af1: My guys went for your things. Just relax.
mail.5a8fd75188a45036844e0af2: So? We good? See you later - gotta work to do.
mail.5a8fd75188a45036844e0af3: Gonna close this insurance case happened {date} and {time}. Live long and stay alive, soldier.
mail.5a8fd75188a45036844e0af4: Ok, that's it for now. Feel free to use insurance services any time you need.
mail.5a8fd75188a45036844e0af5: I'm closing insurance case happened {date} in {time}. Good bye.
mail.5a8fd75188a45036844e0af6: I see everything went well enough. Closed this insurance case happened {date} in {time}. Try to be more careful next time.
mail.5a8fd75188a45036844e0af7: Ok, finished with this insurance case. came back if you will need anything. Just don't forget to bring money.
mail.5a8fd75188a45036844e0af8: Wha? Your stuff? There is no your staff anymore - it was too long to wait. Next time be more watchful.
mail.5a8fd75188a45036844e0af9: Where were you, man? I was keeping your stuff for too long - sold it already. Sorry, man.
mail.5a8fd75188a45036844e0afa: What are you trying to say? You should come and get this returned items earlier - now they are gone!

mail.5ab0f32686f7745dd409f562: What’s up, warrior? Implying you really put’em thugs down? Or just picked up some rustbish others were too embarrassed to take, no? Okay, don’t get your jimmies rustled. I’ll believe you until you screw up for real.
mail.5ab0f32686f7745dd409f563: Now that was unexpected! Well, thank you. Not the most important of deliveries, but thanks anyway. Not related to business. This is, you might say, personal. Oh and just so you know, I won’t be found wanting, so keep it in mind for the future who’s best to work with.
mail.5ab0f32686f7745dd409f564: How did it go? Don’t bother, I know, huge success. You're here in one piece, and the interested folks passed a word they’ve done just fine. So it’s double bonus this time, from me and those people.
mail.5ab0f32686f7745dd409f565: What, success again? Bit of a warrior, eh? The Terror of Tarkov, my arse! Don’t be offended now! Everything’s done right, I owe you one. Important business taken care of - I feel good. And when I feel good, proper people around me start feeling good as well. Got it?
mail.5ab0f32686f7745dd409f566: Some luck with you there, warrior! Such a treasure to get hold of. That’s worthy of a hefty reward. And a little extra for not leaking it on the side - and my goodwill, which is over any money.
mail.5ab0f32686f7745dd409f567: Well, they say money can't buy friendship, but I still owe you.
mail.5ab0f32686f7745dd409f568: Now that’s what it means to work with proven man! Said, done!
mail.5ab0f32686f7745dd409f569: Well, thank you! No wonder Prapor recommended you as a reliable and responsible person.
mail.5ab0f32686f7745dd409f56a: Impressive indeed! It's almost a nuclear suitcase! No surprise he spared no people trying to pull this out.
mail.5ab0f32686f7745dd409f56b: Thank you, young man. Can't say why I need them, but believe me, it's for a good cause.
mail.5ab0f32686f7745dd409f56c: About time. You did an important service to many, if not everyone.
mail.5ab0f32686f7745dd409f56d: How curious! So that's where that water went. Thank you. I will inform my people. Skier certainly would not be happy with me interfering with his interests, but what won’t you do for the sake of the people.
mail.5ab0f32686f7745dd409f56e: You can be proud of yourself - even if you took lives today, they weren’t lives of the best species of human race, instead giving a chance to many civilians.
mail.5ab0f32686f7745dd409f56f: I thank you from the bottom of my heart. I won’t even explain how much it is - and at the same time how little - in our conditions. Most people would take them for themselves, but you gave it away. Thank you.
mail.5ab0f32686f7745dd409f571: Well, that was not quite expected from you, honestly! Thanks to these plans we could find and send food to civilians, and now all this wealth will end up with Fence, who’ll just sell it for ten times the price!  How can you team up with this scoundrel?
mail.5ab0f32686f7745dd409f572: Can’t stop wondering at the reliability of your services.
mail.5ab0f32686f7745dd409f573: What a prick you are, for sure. Got a word you gave the folder to that medic after all. Freaking Savior of mankind.
mail.5ab0f32686f7745dd409f574: Well, blah. Nicely done! Take it, as promised, double-crossing’s not for me. See ya, keep in touch.
mail.5ab0f32686f7745dd409f575: Well, now we can add meat to out exquisite variety of meals. Thanks a lot, young man.
mail.5ab0f32686f7745dd409f576: It’s delightful to find was a responsible person who is willing to take risks for the common good.
mail.5ab0f32686f7745dd409f577: I see, a job he wanted. Doesn’t look like we can get along, since you can’t do shit. Go on, buzz off.
mail.5ab0f32686f7745dd409f578: Holy crap, that was unexpected. Okay, sign the receipt. I’ve memorized you, so drop by sometimes. Jobs come up all the time, of different nature, but people expire fast these days.
mail.5ab0f32686f7745dd409f579: You’re a damn Pinkerton! Helped me out big time!
mail.5ab0f32686f7745dd409f57a: Ah-hah, now that was a stirrup if I ever seen one! I get word from all channels that some devil is at large and grounded quite a bunch of people. You rock, get your reward.
mail.5ab0f32686f7745dd409f57b: You have no idea what exactly you’ve accomplished for these people.
mail.5ab0f32686f7745dd409f57c: And you said nothing’s there! Although they might be empty. Need to check. In any case, the pay’s on me.
mail.5ab0f32686f7745dd409f57d: When the deed is done, go get your fun. Let's see what will come of it.
mail.5ab0f32686f7745dd409f57e: Damn... Apparently, I was wrong to count on you. Nothing I can help you with. I’m neck-deep in the problems now thanks to your half-assed war.
mail.5ab0f32686f7745dd409f57f: Thank you, warrior. Well, your hobo used to dwell on the railway, in the train car next to the boiler. My guys have seen him there often. See you later.
mail.5ab0f32686f7745dd409f580: How long I live and wonder still. How was he surviving all this time? He can’t put two words together! Whatever. Let's first disinfect all this and wash it with Cologne, and then open and have a look.
mail.5ab0f32686f7745dd409f581: It seems, this problem is not solved, only got more complicated. Well, whatever. Come what may.
mail.5ab0f32686f7745dd409f582: Well, great. Now it’s time to get as far as possible while they do their experiments. We can have a look later.
mail.5ab0f32686f7745dd409f583: Oh you bloody bastard! Everything down the damn drain! Biatch, so much effort just wasted!  The hell is wrong with you? You’re a sensible dude, not air-headed. Ah, to hell with you, spoiled such a jackpot! No way I’m letting you in on something serious.
mail.5ab0f32686f7745dd409f584: Now that is right on! Well now we’re tied up good, bro. Awesome that you didn’t chicken out at the last moment. Now I can fill you in on really serious business.
mail.5ab0f32686f7745dd409f585: I have nothing to say. It scares me to think of who and why might need this chemical.
